resources.string: Already have an account? Sign in
Don\'t you have an account? Register
Given an image, the child must recognize the associated word.\nThe child is provided with up to 3 audio aids to help recognize the word.
Given an audio playing 3 words in sequence, the child must record an audio repeating the words in the correct sequence.
Given two images and the audio playback of a word, the child must recognize the correct image to which the word refers.
Look at the image and record an audio pronouncing the corresponding word.\nYou have up to 3 audio aids to help you recognize the word.
Listen to the three words in sequence and record an audio repeating them in the correct sequence.
Look at the two images and listen to the audio that plays a word. Choose the correct image to which the word refers.
Exercises must be different from each other
Are you sure you want to remove the therapy?
Add n exercises\nto create a new therapy

Tony is a cheerful and lively child. With his eyes sparkling with curiosity, Tony is always ready for a new adventure. He wears colorful clothes and sneakers to face every challenge the world presents to him. His contagious smile brightens his face as he explores the world with his backpack full of enthusiasm. Tony represents the innocence of childhood and the joy of discovering the wonders that life has to offer.

Torvaldo is an imposing troll with a thick cloak of fur. He wears a helmet with imposing horns and wields a huge war axe. Despite his fierce appearance, he has a loyal heart and a unique sense of humor among trolls.

Gelatiello is a lively and colorful ice cream cone with stylish sunglasses, always ready to spread joy. He moves agilely through the city on a skateboard, bringing a smile to everyone. His tastes vary, and the sunglasses reflect the summer sun as he zooms down the street.

Trombone is an extraordinary musician who plays the trombone, dressed in a dark cloak and magical ornaments. His notes can enchant anyone who listens to them, transporting them to fantastic worlds. He wears a pointed hat decorated with stars and moons.

Rex Fulminatus is a majestic and powerful T-Rex, with shiny scales reflecting the sunlight. His tail is long and muscular, and his eyes express ancient wisdom. He carries himself with a regal air, as if he were the undisputed monarch of the dinosaur world.

Oculopodio is an extraordinary octopus with a single central eye. His arms are adorned with cute suckers, and he possesses extraordinary intelligence. He moves gracefully in the water, always in search of underwater adventures and discoveries.

Robotelmo is a futuristic robot with a decorated helmet. His metallic body reflects light, and his antennas emit bright signals. Equipped with advanced artificial intelligence, Roboelmo is programmed to perform various tasks, but he also has an affable and curious personality.

Cubot is a cubic robot that loves to perform acrobatic somersaults. With a simple design and reflective surfaces, he turns robotics into a fun spectacle. His lively personality is evident in his digital expressions during acrobatics, bringing joy to everyone he meets.

The Celestial Path is an enchanted path that winds through an ancient forest, illuminated by fairy lights and surrounded by majestic trees. The soft and smooth terrain makes walking a pleasant experience, while magical creatures dance among the trees, making this path an enchanting adventure.

The Floating Island is a paradise suspended in the clouds, wrapped in an ethereal light and surrounded by sparkling air cascades. On this floating landmass, fantastic trees and colorful gardens thrive, while flying creatures and giant dragonflies dart through the air. The atmosphere here is pervaded by a sense of magic and wonder, turning every visit into an extraordinary journey.

Mars, the fourth planet from the Sun, captures the imagination with its alien landscape. The Map of Mars offers a detailed look at this red and mysterious land, highlighting the unique features that make it so fascinating for astronomers and space exploration enthusiasts. From its thin atmosphere to its icy poles, Mars is a world rich in mysteries and promises of future discoveries.

The vibrant atmosphere of this background is composed of waves of vibrant color blending in harmony. The bright tones and smooth transition between shades create a dynamic and captivating atmosphere. Each wave brings with it a positive energy, making this background perfect for inspiring creativity and vitality.

A fascinating journey into deep space, this purple background offers a surreal glimpse into the wonders of the universe. Among sparkling stars and distant galaxies, the color purple envelops the cosmic space, creating a mysterious and magical atmosphere. It is an invitation to explore the unknown and contemplate the infinite.

The serene sky dominates this background, painting a picture of tranquility and beauty. The shades of blue gently fade from one horizon to the other, while fluffy clouds decorate the panorama. This background evokes a sense of peace and serenity, ideal for moments of reflection and relaxation.

A rich and varied representation of natural beauty, this background captures the diversity of natural environments. From lush forests to blooming meadows, from majestic mountains to winding rivers, nature manifests itself in all its grandeur and variety. This background celebrates the wonder of wildlife and invites to connect with the beauty of the Earth.
